name: Into The Roots (paveleon)
description: A small game about how you help a small tree take root and become a huge tree. You need to stack the roots on the grid. For each used combination you get points. For each completed line get more points and new combinations. A completed line clears all lines above it. Your points affect the growth of the tree. The game ends when you run out of combos or grid space. Tap/Click - start. Swipe up - show grid. Swipe down - show tree. Tap/Click (on combination) - rotate. Drag'n'drop - place combination on grid .
